name: Glue Home
description: At Glue, we're passionate about inventing the future of convenience. Whether it's letting you know your kids are home from school, lending virtual keys to a friend, or providing temporary access to cleaners or in-home deliveries, we want to make the user experience as smooth and secure as possible. Imagine - coming home to your grocery order already in the fridge, dry cleaning returned and your online shopping packages waiting in the hall. We think that's pretty exciting, and we're looking for individuals who are interested in the future possibilities of Glue, and the prospect of joining our team to create and evolve fantastic, game-changing products.

jobs.title: Marketing Assistant - Swedish Speaking
jobs.description:
About the role 

We are looking for a Marketing Assistant to join our London or Stockholm team and support our marketing activities across the UK and Sweden. You will be communicating with our customers across our marketing channels and helping us continue to grow. You thrive in a dynamic fast-paced, high-energy environment who realises that to get the job done you have to roll up your sleeves and make it happen. 

The right person for this role is a doer that solves problems pragmatically and creatively, that gets excited about achieving goals and that enjoys the challenges of communication. 

What you will do

Help plan, execute and analyse marketing campaigns across all channels such as digital marketing, email marketing, partnership marketing, influencer marketing and PR 
Create written and visual content for our channels e.g. website, press, social media, email and digital ads 
Manage our Social Media channels across Sweden and the UK
Act as a gatekeeper for our marketing channels, ensuring that best practice is used throughout 
Learn about Digital Marketing, growing a tech startup and working in an international cross-functional team 
 
What you will need

- Hands-on execution - be able to complete a project from end to end, from campaign design and planning, building the campaign in internal tools to result tracking and analysis 
- Data-driven - you are convinced that data is key to decision making and eager to measure, track and evaluate the results of your work 
- University degree (business or marketing preferred) or equivalent related to marketing. 
- At least 1 year of work experience in marketing, project management, PR, digital advertising or equivalent. 
- Passion for learning and working in a small, collaborative team 
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Native in Swedish and English

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description:
The role

We are looking for an ambitious and creative individual to join our Stockholm team as a Partnerships Associate, to manage our existing accounts in Sweden. It will be your role to ensure that from the moment of launch, our Partners are consistently delighted by Glue; our service, team and ability to collaborate effectively. It is essential that this person is a fantastic communicator, enjoys client success and development, and can solve problems on the fly. 


Key responsibilities: 

- Relationship building
Build trusting, long term business relationships with our Partners. It is critical that you confidently manage the communication between the team, key Partner stakeholders and vice versa to achieve goals and ensure smooth execution. 

- Be a Partner champion
Become the voice of our Partners internally. Communicate their priorities effectively and clearly to the wider team, and always have their best interests at heart. Work hand-in-glove with Operations and Product & Engineering.  

- Long term strategic planning
Work with our Partners to understand their long term goals and how Glue can play a key role. Set clear and ambitious plans on how to realistically reach those goals and influence continued success. 

- Performance tracking 
Track and analyse key Partner metrics; understand what good looks like and how to work towards and beyond that mark with the help of your project team, both on the Partner side, and internally

- Daily trouble- shooting
You are the spokesperson of Glue to our Partner, and of our Partner to Glue. You will be first in line to react to daily cases, and be a ninja at filtering crises to the right people and functions.

- Process process process
Create, implement and analyse key account management processes which assist Glue Partnership success. Communicate with your immediate and wider team to ensure clarity of goals and focus. 

- Motivate Partners to trial new product and engineering launches 
Collaborate with key Partner stakeholders to communicate, organise tests and feedback sessions on new product and engineering launches.
